INSTRUMENT: RAYNGER II PLUS HOST: FIELD EXPERIMENT
Instrument Information ====================== Instrument Id : RMTR Instrument Host Id : FEXP Pi Pds User Id : BJAKOSKY Instrument Name : RAYNGER II PLUS Instrument Type : RADIOMETER Instrument Mass : 1.400000 Instrument Length : 0.135000 Instrument Width : 0.076000 Instrument Height : 0.200000 Instrument Manufacturer Name : RAYTEK INCORPORATED
Instrument Description ====================== The Raytek Raynger II Plus instrument is a hand held radiometer. It can be used to measure surface brightness temperature. The instrument measures thermal energy radiated from a surface and computes a temperature assuming an emissivity.
Science Objectives ================== Measure emitted thermal energy of field and laboratory samples.

'RMTR' Section Parameter 'RADIANCE' ----------------------------------- Radiance is the amount of energy per time per projected area per steradian.
